tag_list: optics, mba, barcelona, strategy, entrepreneur, startup
overview:
Passionate about life, outdoors and new ventures!

Consulted with VC funds, incubators and small companies on market assessment, entry strategies and operations analysis. Camilo has accomplished numerous milestones developing new technologies for the aerospace and telecommunications industries transforming technical ideas into real products. Throughout his career, Camilo has proven a keen focus on achieving project goals through attention to detail, client needs and maintaining critical open communication with all parties involved. Camilo expertise are in product development through research and development, operational integration, product and project management, and client relations.
